item.name: SPECIES
List all species

request.description: This service will return the sorted list of all available species as an array.

item.name: MAP
ALL
Occurrence grid cells statistics

request.description:
This service will return the count of all map grid cells that have species occurrence probabilities, regardless of period and future model scenario.

The result will be a single integer value.

item.name: Occurrence grid cells as array

request.description:
This service will return all map grid cell coordinates that have species occurrence probabilities, regardless of period and future model scenario.

The service expects two required URL parameters:

- `start`: First record index, zero-based.
- `limit`: Number of records to return.

Each record will be an array of two elements: longitude and latitude.

item.name: Occurrence grid cells as GeoJSON points

request.description:
This service will return all map grid cell points that have species occurrence probabilities, regardless of period and future model scenario.

The service expects two required URL parameters:

- `start`: First record index, zero-based.
- `limit`: Number of records to return.

Each record will be a GeoJSON point object.

item.name: SPECIES
Species occurrence stats by period and scenario

query.description: Future model scenario, ignore for period `cur2005`.

request.description:
This service will return the count of all map grid cells for a specific species, period and future scenario.

The service expects the following URL parameters:

- `species`: Genus and species.
- `period`: The time period:
   - `cur2005`: Centered on 2005, current period.
   - `fut2035`: Future modeled period centered on 2035.
   - `fut2065`: Future modeled period centered on 2065.
   - `fut2095`: Future modeled period centered on 2095.
- `scenario`: Model scenario, only for future periods:
   - `rcp45`: Representative Concentration Pathway 4.5 (RCP 4.5).
   - `rcp85`: Representative Concentration Pathway 8.5 (RCP 8.5).

If the period is `cur2005`, the scenario will be ignored.

The result will be a single integer value.

item.name: Species occurrence data by period and scenario as array

query.description: Future period model scenario, ignored for current period (cur2005).

request.description:
Given a species, a period and a model scenario, this service will return all the available grid cell coordinates, for the target species, the time period and the eventual future model scenario, as an array of three floating point values: longitude, latitude and occurrence probability in the range from 0 to 100.

The service expects the following parameters:

- `species`: Genus and species.
- `period`: The time period:
   - `cur2005`: Centered on 2005, current period.
   - `fut2035`: Future modeled period centered on 2035.
   - `fut2065`: Future modeled period centered on 2065.
   - `fut2095`: Future modeled period centered on 2095.
- `scenario`: Model scenario, only for future periods:
   - `rcp45`: Representative Concentration Pathway 4.5 (RCP 4.5).
   - `rcp85`: Representative Concentration Pathway 8.5 (RCP 8.5).
- `start`: First record index, zero-based.
- `limit`: Number of records to return.

Each record will be an array of three elements: longitude, latitude and occurrence probability in the range from 0 to 100.

item.name: Species occurrence data by period and scenario as GeoJSON points

query.description: Future period model scenario, ignored for current period (cur2005).

request.description:
Given a species, a period and a model scenario, this service will return all the available grid points, for the target species, the time period and the eventual future model scenario, as a GeoJSON point object with the property 'value' in the range from 0 to 100.

The service expects the following parameters:

- `species`: Genus and species.
- `period`: The time period:
   - `cur2005`: Centered on 2005, current period.
   - `fut2035`: Future modeled period centered on 2035.
   - `fut2065`: Future modeled period centered on 2065.
   - `fut2095`: Future modeled period centered on 2095.
- `scenario`: Model scenario, only for future periods:
   - `rcp45`: Representative Concentration Pathway 4.5 (RCP 4.5).
   - `rcp85`: Representative Concentration Pathway 8.5 (RCP 8.5).
- `start`: First record index, zero-based.
- `limit`: Number of records to return.

Each record is a GeoJSON point object with its 'value' property corresponding to the species occurrence probability as a float value ranging from 0 to 100.

item.name: PAIR
ALL
Indicators pair statistics for period and scenario

request.description:
This service will return statistics related to the requested indicators pair, period and scenario.

The service expects the following URL parameters:

- `period`: The time period:
    - `1960-1990`: Current period, centered on 1960 to 1990.
    - `1991-2020`: Future period, centered on 1991 to 2020.
    - `2021-2050`: Future period, centered on 2021 to 2050.
    - `2051-2080`: Future period, centered on 2051 to 2080.
- `scenario`: Model scenario, only for future periods:
    - `rcp45`: Representative Concentration Pathway 4.5 (RCP 4.5).
    - `rcp85`: Representative Concentration Pathway 8.5 (RCP 8.5).
- `X`: X-axis indicator:
    - `bio01`: Mean annual air temperature.
    - `bio12`: Annual precipitation amount.
    - `bio15`: Precipitation seasonality.
    - `ci`: Continentality.
    - `ps`: Summer precipitation.
    - `pw`: Winter precipitation.
    - `ts`: Summer temperature.
- `Y`: Y-axis indicator, the allowed value are the same as the *X-axis* indicator.

If the period is `1960-1990`, the scenario will be ignored. The value of the *X-axis* must be different than the value of the *Y-axis*.

The service will return the following object:

- `count`: Total number of unique X and Y combinations.
- `@X`: Statistics for the X-axis indicator value: *min* minimum, *avg* average and *max* maximum.
- `@Y`: Statistics for the Y-axis indicator value: *min* minimum, *avg* average and *max* maximum.
- `items`: Statistics for the number of grid items matching the indicators pair value combinations: *min* minimum, *avg* average and *max* maximum.

item.name: Indicators pair values for period and scenario as array

query.description: First record page index, zero is the first page

request.description:
This service will return indicators pair values related to the requested period and scenario.

The service expects the following URL parameters:

- `period`: The time period:
    - `1960-1990`: Current period, centered on 1960 to 1990.
    - `1991-2020`: Future period, centered on 1991 to 2020.
    - `2021-2050`: Future period, centered on 2021 to 2050.
    - `2051-2080`: Future period, centered on 2051 to 2080.
- `scenario`: Model scenario, only for future periods:
    - `rcp45`: Representative Concentration Pathway 4.5 (RCP 4.5).
    - `rcp85`: Representative Concentration Pathway 8.5 (RCP 8.5).
- `X`: X-axis indicator:
    - `bio01`: Mean annual air temperature.
    - `bio12`: Annual precipitation amount.
    - `bio15`: Precipitation seasonality.
    - `ci`: Continentality.
    - `ps`: Summer precipitation.
    - `pw`: Winter precipitation.
    - `ts`: Summer temperature.
- `Y`: Y-axis indicator, the allowed value are the same as the *X-axis* indicator.
- `start`: First record page index, zero is the first page.
- `limit`: Number of records per page.

If the period is `1960-1990`, the scenario will be ignored. The value of the *X-axis* must be different than the value of the *Y-axis*.

The service will return an array of arrays:

- *[0]*: X-axis indicator value.
- *[1]*: Y-axis indicator value..
- *[2]*: Number of matching grid items.

item.name: SPECIES
Indicators pair statistics for species, period and scenario

request.description:
This service will return statistics related to the requested indicators pair, period and scenario.

The service expects the following URL parameters:

- `species`: Genus and species of interest.
- `period`: The time period:
    - `1960-1990`: Current period, centered on 1960 to 1990.
    - `1991-2020`: Future period, centered on 1991 to 2020.
    - `2021-2050`: Future period, centered on 2021 to 2050.
    - `2051-2080`: Future period, centered on 2051 to 2080.
- `scenario`: Model scenario, only for future periods:
    - `rcp45`: Representative Concentration Pathway 4.5 (RCP 4.5).
    - `rcp85`: Representative Concentration Pathway 8.5 (RCP 8.5).
- `X`: X-axis indicator:
    - `bio01`: Mean annual air temperature.
    - `bio12`: Annual precipitation amount.
    - `bio15`: Precipitation seasonality.
    - `ci`: Continentality.
    - `ps`: Summer precipitation.
    - `pw`: Winter precipitation.
    - `ts`: Summer temperature.
- `Y`: Y-axis indicator, the allowed value are the same as the *X-axis* indicator.

If the period is `1960-1990`, the scenario will be ignored. The value of the *X-axis* must be different than the value of the *Y-axis*.

The service will return the following object:

- `count`: Total number of unique X and Y combinations.
- `@X`: Statistics for the X-axis indicator value: *min* minimum, *avg* average and *max* maximum.
- `@Y`: Statistics for the Y-axis indicator value: *min* minimum, *avg* average and *max* maximum.
- `items`: Statistics for the number of grid items matching the indicators pair value combinations: *min* minimum, *avg* average and *max* maximum.
